name: Price Squid
overview:
PriceSquid helps e-commerce businesses achieve more by providing in-depth information about competitors, from price and stock data to total market overviews.

To address the specific needs of web-based online firms, PriceSquid have build a unique scanning service. In order to undertake a broad range of services for e-commerce businesses, we provide market data, competitor profiles, competitive benchmarking, strategic pricing setup tools, customized functionality and analytics.

Through our scanning service, our subscribers are able to gather up to twenty-three different pieces of information on each product on all products on all competitors.

PriceSquid is constantly developing and introducing new services and tools according to our subscribersâ€™ requirements.

milestones.description: PriceSquid Ltd. made the official launch of their innovative e-commerce price optimization software today.
milestones.source_description: New E-commerce Tool; Markets First Web Crawler and Automatic Pricing Adjustment Tool Launched.
